message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $110. I believe it's quite valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $100 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still can't go above $95 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle for you.
